Our Services

ImEx Cargo is your dynamic partner in logistics, revolutionizing the way you do business. We offer comprehensive logistics services and serve as trusted GSA/GSSA experts for airlines in the New England, New York, New Jersey, and Philadelphia regions. What sets us apart is our commitment to helping companies and government agencies achieve their diversity and inclusion goals. We don't just move goods; we move possibilities, leveraging our vast network of strategic partners and logistics experts to propel your success. Choose ImEx Cargo, and unlock a world of opportunities for your business.

Elevate Your Air Cargo Sales

ImEx Cargo, your trusted General Sales Agent (GSA), unlocks new horizons for your airline partnerships. We excel in marketing and optimizing cargo capacity across all scheduled and non-scheduled freighter flights. Gain the competitive edge with our insights into local market rates and conditions.

Discover our 3PL/4PL Services!

Our expert team ensures an integrated supply chain solution. Whether it's refrigeration upon arrival, precision pick and pack operations, or doorstep delivery, we've got you covered. Distribution, warehousing, and logistics are our specialties. Your cargo journey starts here!

Fulfilling Government Contracts

We're certified by City, State, and Federal authorities to manage government contracts through the Supplier Diversity Program. ImEx Cargo is your approved vendor, ready to collaborate with companies and government agencies. Our strategic partnerships and logistics experts ensure supplier diversity goals are achieved.

Specialized Cargo Experts

When your cargo needs extra care, trust ImEx Cargo. We specialize in handling unique shipments, ensuring they reach their destination securely. From delicate electronics to oversized machinery, we've got the expertise to transport your specialized cargo with precision.

Shipment Status Tracker

Experience the thrill of anticipation like never before with our 'Shipment Status Tracker' feature. Simply enter your tracking code, and behold your package's journey in real-time as it makes its way to your doorstep. From exciting milestones to estimated delivery times, this tool turns waiting into an adventure. Join us on this digital voyage and watch your shipment's progress unfold before your eyes!
